title.native: とんでもスキルで異世界放浪メシ
title.romaji: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi
title.english: Campfire Cooking in Another World with my Absurd Skill

description:
Mukouda Tsuyoshi, an ordinary salaryman, is suddenly transported to another world one day. The unique skill he gains upon arrival in this world is the seemingly useless "Online Grocery." Mukouda is discouraged at first, but the modern foods he's able to bring to his new world using this skill prove to have some unbelievable effects!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: Regarding the Display of an Outrageous Skill Which Has Incredible Powers
สกิลสุดพิสดารกับมื้ออาหารในต่างโลก
Mengembara dan Memasak di Dunia Lain dengan Skil yang Absurd

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.description: Features the recreational activity of camping, either in a tent, vehicle, or simply sleeping outdoors.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

node.description: **Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akagi_hisako)

Married to [Arifumi Imai](https://anilist.co/staff/126915/). Representative of [Akagi Production](https://akagipro.jp/).

Utatane Kana is a lyricist, composer, arranger and pianist from Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan. She works for Tawara and is part of KanadeYUK.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Utatanekana)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mtocoda/)

He worked as a music composer for Capcom after graduating from the Kunitachi College of Music. He left the company in 2003 and founded Design Wave in 2007, and is still working as a composer for video games.  He is known for his work on the Devil May Cry and Monster Hunter series.

She started off as a painter in the early '80s, and then switched to photography work. Stopped doing photography when animation switched to digital and nowadays just focuses on special effects.

Titular member of Team Taniguchi, a subsidiary of [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/) specializing in special effects.

name.native: 栗コーダーカルテット

node.description:
__Members:__ 
- Masaki Kurihara: soprano recorder, melodica, crumhorn, etc. 
- Yoshiyuki Kawaguchi: alto recorder, bodhran, saxophone, etc. 
- Kenji Kondo: tenor recorder, guitar, ukulele, etc. 
- Takero Sekizima: great bass recorder, tuba, jew's harp, etc.

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kuricorder) | [Official Website](http://www.kuricorder.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kuricorder) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/kuricorderquartet)

__Agency:__ Intention

[Website](https://www.uchidayuma.com/) | [Profile](https://intention-k.com/profile/yuma_uchida) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuma_u_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/i_am_yumauchida)

A Japanese voice actor and singer. He made his singing debut in May 2018 under the King Records label. He is [Maaya Uchida](https://anilist.co/staff/108639/)'s younger brother.

His agency announced that he married the voice actress [Rina Hidaka](https://anilist.co/staff/100250) on January 1st, 2024.

__Awards:__
- In 2017, he won Best Male Newcomer at the 11th Seiyuu Awards for his role as [Hayate Immelmann](https://anilist.co/character/90102/).
- In 2019, he won Best Male Lead Actor at the 13th Seiyuu Awards for his role as [Ash Lynx](https://anilist.co/character/13580/).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Kaveh - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Aaron Wei (The Legend of Heroes Series)
- G'raha Tia - Final Fantasy XIV (VG)
-Anaxa - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kimu777)

Makoto Kimura is an animation producer originally from Fuji TV Noitamina. He then moved to [Twin Engine](https://anilist.co/studio/6199/Twin-Engine) and later then to Studio [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/MAPPA) where he was the Director of Planning Department. In April 2024, he left MAPPA and formed BLUE RIGHTS Co. Ltd.

_Note: Not to be confused with the background artist [Makoto Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/182523/)._
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).
